data.title: Love Actually
data.text:
Movies

Love Actually and Elf Are Timeless, and Very Rooted in a Specific Era

Released on the same day in 2003, the two neo-holiday classics are very much products of the post–9/11 period in which they were made.

hate, actually

Hugh Grant Would “Happily Shred” His IMDB Page—And He Often Does

The famously grumpy actor has devoted much of his recent press tour to nitpicking his own filmography—from Notting Hill to Love Actually.

career timeline

Bill Nighy Never Auditioned Again After Love Actually

The Living actor took Vanity Fair through his career timeline, sharing stories from Pirates of the Caribbean, Love Actually, and his entire body of work.

When Snape Met Mr. Bean

Alan Rickman Was Apparently Driven “Insane” by One Love Actually Scene

In an ABC News special celebrating 20 years of Love Actually, director Richard Curtis reveals that Rickman wasn't particularly fond of his gift-wrapping scene with Rowan Atkinson.

hate, actually

Hugh Grant Still Bitterly Loathes Every Second of the Love, Actually Dancing Scene

Every time you watch that scene, know that you are watching a man who is suffering.
